aovs.value:
[expression,#  available variables:
#  "core" - PrismCore
#  "context" - dict

if context.get("mediaType") == "2drenders":
	template = "@renderversion_path@"
else:
	template = "@renderversion_path@/@aov@"]

renderFilesAssets.value:
[expression,#  available variables:
#  "core" - PrismCore
#  "context" - dict

if context.get("mediaType") == "2drenders":
	template = "@aov_path@/@asset@_@identifier@_@version@@.(frame)@@extension@"
else:
	template = "@aov_path@/@asset@_@identifier@_@version@_@aov@@.(frame)@@extension@"]

renderFilesShots.value:
[expression,#  available variables:
#  "core" - PrismCore
#  "context" - dict

if context.get("mediaType") == "2drenders":
	template = "@aov_path@/@sequence@-@shot@_@identifier@_@version@@.(frame)@@extension@"
else:
	template = "@aov_path@/@sequence@-@shot@_@identifier@_@version@_@aov@@.(frame)@@extension@"]

deadlineJobName.value:
[expression,#  available variables:
#  "core" - PrismCore
#  "context" - dict

if context.get("type") == "asset":
    base = "@project_name@_@asset@"
else:
    base = "@project_name@_@sequence@-@shot@"

template = base + "_@product@@identifier@_@version@"]
